text: Fakhalafa Min Ba`dihim Khalfun Warithu Al-Kitaba Ya'khudhuna `Arađa Hadha Al-'Adna Wa Yaquluna Sayughfaru Lana Wa 'In Ya'tihim `Arađun Mithluhu Ya'khudhuhu 'Alam Yu'ukhadh `Alayhim Mithaqu Al-Kitabi 'An La Yaqulu `Ala Allahi 'Illa Al-Haqqa Wa Darasu Ma Fihi Wa Ad-Daru Al-'Akhiratu Khayrun Lilladhina Yattaquna 'Afala Ta`qiluna
